name: Auto-Notify Module
description: The Auto-Nofiy Module is a REDCap external module that enables admins to send e-mail notifications to users. Auto-Notify supports features that are not provided by REDCap's "Email Users" page, including: automated sending of e-mails (e-mails can be scheduled to be sent recurringly), message variables (e.g., [last_name] for the recipient's last name), and custom recipient lists that can be specified with built-in forms or an included query builder. The query builder can also be used as a graphical user interface for querying the REDCap database.

crons.cron_description: Cron that checks for notifications to send
